Clinical and epidemiological features of 36 children with coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) in Zhejiang, China: an observational cohort study. Lancet Infect. Dis. ( 2020) ( Epub ahead of print).

note.p: â€¢ Shows the epidemiological and clinical features of pediatric patients with COVID-19. The route of transmission in children was by close contact with family members (89%) or a history of exposure to the epidemic area or both exposures. Symptoms are similar to that of adult patients.
